project.title: 🎬 Video Production Prompter
project.subtitle: Day 1: AI Starter That Teaches You (No Copy-Paste)

voice_over_segments.text: Stuck in the AI boom and don't know where to start?

scene.title: RELATABLE PAIN
scene.visual_cue: You at desk, 5+ tutorial tabs open, slight head shake.
scene.thumbnail:
📸 Scene 1: Overwhelmed at Desk
(5+ AI Tutorial Tabs Open)

voice_over_segments.text: In 60 seconds, I'll give you a learning starter that teaches you real AI—not just copy-paste.

scene.title: HONEST PROMISE
scene.visual_cue: Turn to camera, warm eye contact, subtle nod.
scene.thumbnail:
📸 Scene 2: Direct to Camera
(Warm, Trustworthy Eye Contact)

voice_over_segments.text: Everyone says 'learn AI'—but where do you actually begin? You need a foundation you can understand and build on.

scene.title: REAL PROBLEM (Breathe - 10s)
scene.visual_cue: Fast montage of "AI in 24hrs," "No Code AI," "Earn £10k/mo" thumbnails. Hold the final image for 2s to let the feeling sink in.

voice_over_segments.text: This Build-Your-Own-Model template isn't finished code—it's your learning lab. Every line is commented to explain what it does and why.

scene.title: LEARNING TOOL (Breathe - 15s)
scene.visual_cue: VS Code: Slow pan across the comments in the define_model function. Highlight: "// This loads your data..." comment is visible and highlighted with a yellow glow.
scene.thumbnail:
📸 Scene 4: VS Code with Comments
(Yellow Highlight on "// This loads your data...")

voice_over_segments.text: Fork it. Read the comments. Change one function. Break it. Fix it. That's how you actually learn. It's called Delivery Pilot—your AI training ground.

scene.title: PRACTICE METHOD (CRITICAL SECTION - 20s)
scene.visual_cue:
The "Break-Fix Loop" (VO plays over this extended sequence):
1. Show GitHub Fork & Clone in terminal (5s)
2. Run install & Green Check Output (3s)
3. Deliberate Break: Edit load_data function to cause an error (2s)
4. Run → Red Error Text fills terminal (Hold 4s)
5. Fix the code (2s)
6. Run → Green Check Output (Hold 4s)
scene.thumbnail:
📸 Scene 5: Break-Fix Loop
(Terminal: Fork → Error → Fix → Success)

voice_over_segments.text: Deploy it locally—your private practice environment. Make mistakes. That's the point.

scene.title: SAFE SPACE (Breathe - 12s)
scene.visual_cue: Left: Terminal Error (Red Text) → Right: Fixed Output (Green Check). Label: Break → Learn → Fix. Hold the graphic for 3s.
scene.thumbnail:
📸 Scene 6: Split Screen
(Left: Error | Right: Success | Label: "Break → Learn → Fix")

voice_over_segments.text: This is Day 1 of understanding AI. Not the finish line. Customize it. Study it. Make it yours over the next week.

scene.title: MOTIVATION (15s)
scene.visual_cue: Genuine eye contact, soft smile. VO Playback: "This is Day 1 of understanding AI... customize it... over the next week."
scene.thumbnail:
📸 Scene 7: Motivational Close-up
(Genuine Eye Contact, Soft Smile)

voice_over_segments.text: GitHub link in description. It's not magic—it's a starting point. Your AI journey starts today. Let's go.

scene.title: EMPOWERING CTA (10s)
scene.visual_cue: Card with text: GitHub → Delivery Pilot + QR code. Music crescendos. Final Push-in/Motivational Ending plays over the last 5s before fading to black.
scene.thumbnail:
📸 Scene 8: End Card
(GitHub Link + QR Code + "Delivery Pilot")
